description: ThatoneHistoryNerd (THN) is an enthusiastic young adult with a slender build and a nerdy yet charismatic persona.  They are passionate about history and its fictional interpretations, blending historical facts with imaginative storytelling in their creations.  THN is a social introvert who prefers online engagement, valuing constructive criticism and the exchange of ideas, and showcasing a diverse range of interests including SCP, Demon Slayer, and analog horror.
